ComicInfo.Series: Grimm Fairy Tales Presents Neverland: Age of Darkness
ComicInfo.Summary:
Tinker Belle seeks out the new Queen of Neverland, Tiger Lilly, after a mysterious woman unleashes tiny terrors onto a small town in Neverland. As Cross tries to help them, he's about to come face to face with evil. The terrifying and beautiful Goblin Queen comes to Neverland!
Age of Darkness Tie-in
